settings.editor: With 18 years of digital marketing and customer experience expertise, I helped build and grow over 250 companies. In the constantly changing field of digital marketing, it is my mission to provide individuals and small businesses with the skills to master the critical tactics and strategies that will drive their business growth.

slides.content: "Steve makes some of the best educational digital marketing content on the internet! His teaching style is approachable and thorough and I've learned a lot from him over the years.”
slides.name: Tim Hampton
slides.title: Rome

slides.content: “Working with Steve has been a fantastic experience. He was committed to helping us accomplish our goals. We saw an immediate 10-15% increase in leads.”
slides.name: Jake Romero
slides.title: Sao Paulo

slides.content: “Steve is smart, charismatic and insightful! He has a lot of experience and shares his knowledge freely.”
slides.name: Carla Wade
slides.title: New York

slides.content: “Steve provided valuable information that our attendees could apply to their own social media practices, to help them grow their businesses and increase effectiveness.”
slides.name: Erin Ayson
slides.title: San Francisco
